bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: ND4J: Numpy pointer methods need updating for new dtypes
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/b797d4b7d382e1604c6e7db15ece074f6c8c6029/nd4j/nd4j-backends/nd4j-api-parent/nd4j-native-api/src/main/java/org/nd4j/nativeblas/BaseNativeNDArrayFactory.java#L113-L253>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/b797d4b7d382e1604c6e7db15ece074f6c8c6029/nd4j/nd4j-backends/nd4j-api-parent/nd4j-native-api/src/main/java/org/nd4j/nativeblas/BaseNativeNDArrayFactory.java#L113-L253</denchmark-link>
Only float32/64 supported currently. We should also add uint16/32/64 loading tests (for these methods and npy/npz loading) now that we have them in ND4J.
